name: Nipponaisuki Kitsune [Inari Ōkami] mixed media canvas artwork
description: Nipponaisuki Kitsune mixed media canvas artwork 80.00 Rare Nipponaisuki mixed media Kitsune canvas artwork! Original character artwork of Kitsune [Inari Ōkami] based on ancient Japanese Mythology. Inari Ōkami [messenger Kitsune, Japanese Fox spirit] is one of the Japanese Kami or Gods in Japanese Shinto and Buddhist philosophy and is the keeper of the physical and spiritual realms, and guardian of prosperity, rice and humans. Inari had also become the patron of blacksmiths and the protector of warriors. She is also believed to be the patron of fox spirits who act as her messengers. The calligraphy created exclusively for the artwork is a collaboration with the skillful calligrapher Hiroko Fukuda of art project Wakoshi, who creates her own style of kawaii kanji. The main Kanji message within translation limits reads "Inari" "Good things from heaven Good things from earth People's easiness" This is a unique artwork piece with very deep and spiritual undertones. The original piece is created using mix media on canvas, that uses special iridescent paint which in certain light make the character and calligraphy glow in certain angles, creating a very unique and spiritual effect. This artwork comes signed and is part of a limited run series. Painting dimensions approximately: Height 410mm x Width 310mm x 27mm Depth Materials: Mixed media on Canvas For limited time only free shipping on all canvas artworks! Please feel free to contact me with any inquires. CONTACT NIPPONAISUKI Please click on image to enlarge. ThankYou! All contents copyright Nipponaisuki ©

name: Nipponaisuki Yumiko mixed media canvas artwork
description: [THIS ITEM IS TEMPORARILY SOLD OUT! PLEASE FEEL FREE TO CONTACT FOR RESTOCK INFO AND CUSTOM ORDERS] Rare Nipponaisuki digital/hand painted Yumiko canvas artwork! Artwork of original character Yumiko, who is the lead character of her own story soon to be made into an original manga novel. Being a digital artist at heart, Nipponaisuki has merged his love for digital art-form with hand painted techniques to create a series of unique and strikingly visual artworks, that hold a one-off value while revealing a delicious amount of detail. The original piece is created using mixed media on canvas. The painting is carefully hand painted using acrylic, inks and metallic and iridescent paints to give the highlight effects and metal details a unique and striking feel, all while being mixed with latest in digital printing techniques! This mixing of media and technique pushes and lovingly embraces the confines of art and technology with more artists soon to follow suit. This artwork is a one-off, signed original. Painting dimensions approximately: Height 410mm x Width 310mm x 27mm Depth Materials: Mixed media on Canvas For limited time only free shipping with all canvas paintings! Please feel free to contact me with any inquires. CONTACT NIPPONAISUKI Please click on images to enlarge. ThankYou! All contents copyright Nipponaisuki ©
